pullrequest.title: New user interaction method and resize functionality

content.raw: My primary concern about adding the `scale` variable to entities other than shapes is the effect it might have on physics, like center of gravity location and joints. It seems helpful for dynamically resizing things individual shapes (collisions & visuals), but it will make the physics more complicated if applied to links and models.
